Can anyone explain to me where the crack is?

1. Mount the first ISO image (Disk 1) on Alcohol 120% or Daemon Tools
2. Start the installation
3. At the request of the second disk, unmount the first ISO image (Disk 1) and mount the second ISO image (Disk 2)
4. Continue and finish the installation
5. Copy the crack into (C:)\The Witcher Enhanced Edition\System"
6. Play

@JagGillarSmisk when u mounted disc 2 open the driver u putted it on and inside the driver there is a file called crack open it and copy the witcher file inside it. u put it into (C:)\The Witcher Enhanced Edition\System"
